hymn.title: Just taste and see that the Lord is good
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C F/C C - | C F/C C - | Em - Am - | Dm - G7 - | C - C7/E - | F - Fm - | C/G - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: Just taste and see that the Lord is good; Just taste and see that the Lord is good. He's good for You, as He is for me; So what -- ev -- er you do, just taste and see.

lyrics.stanza: So praise the Lord for His life in you; Yes, praise the Lord for His life in you. Something of Christ He has outpoured Into your life; so praise the Lord!
